privacy_policy.introduction: GarvelBids ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, [garvelbids.com], or use our services (collectively, the "Site"). Please read this policy carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your personal data and how we will treat it.

auction_data: Items you are interested in or have purchased
content.cookies_and_tracking_technologies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user experience, analyze trends, track users’ movements around the Site, and gather demographic information. You can modify your browser settings to refuse cookies, but some features of the Site may not function properly.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: To provide and maintain our services
To facilitate the auction process, including bids, sales, and payments
To communicate with you, including order confirmations, customer support, and promotional emails (with your consent)
To improve our services and customize your experience on the Site
To prevent fraud and ensure the security of the Site

content.service_providers: We may share your data with third-party service providers who perform services for us, such as payment processors, email services, hosting, and website analytics. These providers are contractually obligated to keep your information confidential.
content.legal_requirements: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities, including to meet national security or law enforcement requirements.
content.business_transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your personal data may be transferred to the new owner.
content.with_your_consent: We may share your data with third parties if you give us explicit consent to do so.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We take reasonable precautions to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

content.access: You may request access to the personal information we hold about you.
content.correction: You may request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete information.
content.deletion: You may request the deletion of your personal data, subject to certain conditions (e.g., legal obligations).
content.opt_out: You may opt-out of receiving marketing communications by following the unsubscribe instructions in any email you receive.
content.data_portability: You may request a copy of your personal data in a commonly used, machine-readable format.
content.contact_details: To exercise these rights, please contact us at [contact@garvelbids.com].

sections.title: 6. Children’s Privacy
sections.content: Our Site is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe we have collected such information, please contact us immediately so we can delete it.

sections.title: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we do, we will post the updated policy on this page and update the "Last updated" date at the top of the page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.
